00100000000000010000000000000001 # PC:0  addi $1, $0, 1
00100000000000100000000000000000 # PC:1  addi $2, $0, 0
00100000010000100000000000000001 # PC:2  addi $2, $2, 1
00100000011000110000000000000001 # PC:3  addi $3, $3, 1
00010000010000011111111111111101 # PC:4  beq $1, $2, -3
11111100000000000000000000000000 # PC:5  EOP
